page.title: 07Unemployed in Rotherham.
page.content: Interview of Alan Rhodes. His name is Alan Rhodes,he is 25 years old.He lives on Kimberworth Park Road.He has been unemployed for four years.We interviewed him on the 20th of June in the school medical room.We asked him some questions like:What jobs has he had since school? "I have had three jobs,I was at a warehouse,I was at the works and the last one was at the council where I learnt a trade" Why did you lose your jobs? "Well,first I packed in because I wanted to go to the steel works, then I was made redundant from there and went on to the council but I got made redundant,so now I am unemployed".
